title: [GAMEPLAY] Malzahar skin bug. Snow Day - Recall issue
body:
When Malz recalls in his Snow Day skin, he hugs one of his voidlings. The voidling featured in his recall is the color of a blue-screen of death, and was not like that when I purchased the skin. There is no texture to the voidling. It is a bright blue, and it is visually unappealing. Please fix this asap. It does not seem to be an issue with graphics, as I have tested this on 2 completely different PCs.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey BWG Smexy! 

Thanks for the report! This isn't a graphics issue - it's a missing texture. :] We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. In this case, it wouldn't be a gameplay issue, but rather skins. ^-^

Oh, sorry :(

But thanks so much for getting back to me!
